price: (Yusuf) dedi ki: «Bugün sizi kınamak yok, Allah sizi affetsin! O, merhametlilerin en merhametlisidir.»
arabic: قَالَ لَا تَثۡرِيبَ عَلَيۡكُمُ ٱلۡيَوۡمَۖ يَغۡفِرُ ٱللَّهُ لَكُمۡۖ وَهُوَ أَرۡحَمُ ٱلرَّٰحِمِينَ

version.title: Turkish Translation - Ali Ozek
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by a group of scholars. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: qāla lā tathrība ʿalaykumu al-yawma yaghfiru al-lahu lakum wahuwa arḥamu al-rāḥimīna
